metadata.title: CVE-2017-17514 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** boxes.c in nip2 8.4.0 does not validate strings beforelaunching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, whichmight allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via acrafted URL. NOTE: a software maintainer indicates that this product doesnot use the BROWSER environment variable.

criterions.comment: nip2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
